document.full_text: russian president dmitry medvedev rapped premier vladimir putin's top deal maker on wednesday for lapses that contributed to the collapse of a major oil deal between rosneft and bp.
document.title: medvedev raps sechin over bp-rosneft deal failure
lines_and_colors: russian president dmitry medvedev rapped premier vladimir putin's top deal maker on wednesday for lapses that contributed to the collapse of a major oil deal between rosneft and bp.
